ConversationParticipant.name: ConversationParticipant
ConversationParticipant.description: Represents an active participant in a conversation. A new ConversationParticipant record is created each time a participant joins a conversation.

AppType.description: The type of app used by the participant, such as messaging, chatbot, live_message, agent. The nillable property is available in API version 51.0 and later.

ConversationId.description: The record ID of the conversation that this participant is part of.

JoinedTime.description: The date and time that a participant joined a conversation.

LastActiveTime.description: The date and time that a participant was last active during a conversation.

LeftTime.description: The date and time that a participant left a conversation.

Name.description: The autogenerated name of the conversation participants.

ParticipantContext.description: An identifier, such as a Facebook page, to add context about this participant.

ParticipantEntityId.description: The ID of the record connected to this participant record, such as a Contact, Messaging End User, or User record.

ParticipantKey.description: A value that uniquely identifies this participant.

ParticipantRole.description: The role of this participant in the conversation, such as Agent, End User, or Supervisor.
